title: The Persistent gum
brief_description: Short film on eucalypt strategies for coping with environmental stress, mainly fire. Useful introduction to this topic, which is an imnportant factor in forest ecology. Some terms may need to be explained prior to showing. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
